     Postgraduate Programme Offered
===================================

The Faculty of Mechanical Engineering (FME) at the Universiti Teknologi Malaysia is a comprehensive engineering faculty offering postgraduate programmes in all major fields of mechanical engineering including robotics, engineering design, thermal engineering, fluid mechanics, materials engineering, advanced manufacturing, aeronautical and automotive engineering, and industrial engineering. FME provides a wide variety of excellent instruction, research opportunities, resources, and facilities to its students.
